body: At 1st level, the swashbuckler may select one martial weapon to add to her list of weapon proficiencies. In addition, she may take the combat trick rogue talent up to two times. This ability replaces trapfinding.
name: Martial Training
url: pfsrd://Advanced Players Guide/Rules/Core Classes/Rogue/Rogue Archetypes/Swashbuckler/Martial Training
